duties_responsibilities.duty: Create cutting tickets, tech packs, embroidery layouts, and flat sketching.
Assist with design and development, including fabric sourcing around the garment district.
Assist the atelier team with cutting patterns, cutting fabric, and hand sewing.
Support the design team with trend research, embroidery design, and concept board creation during collection development.
Assist with organizing and maintaining the fabric library, studio materials, and samples in the atelier.
Assist with photoshoots, garment fittings, and studio visits.

education_certification.credential: Must be able to receive school credit
